summary: A test suite that validates the tokenization logic for the OPT language model, checking consistency between fast and reference tokenizers, confirming correct serialization/deserialization of the fast tokenizer, and verifying that users can customize the beginning‑of‑sequence token.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable and flexible token handling for OPT models in production environments, enabling fast tokenization, persistence of tokenizer state, and user‑defined BOS tokens.
